Нужно докупать доп контент в виде; валокордина и валидола + кресло-морозилку. Но если сэкономить будут последствия в виде разбитый(ая): клавиатура, монитор, наушники, пк- ноутбук, лицо соседа, друга, родственника. Или ваше, если они оказались сильнее))

Imi place la acest joc ca se baga mereu update-uri și ce nu imi place este faptul că sunt foarte mulți copii, ruși care vad ca joci bine și îți da report fără motiv. Sper ca se rezolva treaba asa și ce spun sa mai spun jucati cs go😁😁😁
Coming back to csgo after a long break has been a very rewarding experience, its let me relive my early teens like no other game has or i think ever will.

I met my current wife on this game, and even though she was obese, I'm still glad that we crossed paths. She is the love of my life, especially the bits that stick out. I would 100% recommend this game and suggest you to the csgo reddit page! I met my gay best friend on that platform. His name is Seb and make sure you say hi to him if you encounter him in r/niceguys.

Się wnerwiłem dzisiaj na tę grę. Wbijam na mm'a, w połowie ładowania wywala komunikat "your map differs from the servers", szybkie pytanko do wujka google(bo sama gra nie informuje co trzeba ogarnąć) - ok, trzeba usunąć pliki danej mapy z katalogu z grą, robię jak zalecają, odpalam csa a tam już czeka na mnie ban na 30 min.... Valve weźcie mnie nie denerwujcie bo się nóż w kieszeni sam otwiera...
